RelatedSentence: The radical cleric Abu Hamza plotted the kidnapping of western hostages and aided and abetted terrorism in America and Afghanistan , a jury in Manhattan concluded last night .

The former leader of the Finsbury Park mosque in north London was convicted of 11 terrorism charges and is expected to spend the rest of his life in jail .
His lawyers said that they would appeal .
